    Contact

    Mailing Lists

    • avogadro-announce @ lists.sourceforge.net - Announcements about Avogadro, including new releases.

    Archives

    • avogadro-discuss @ lists.sourceforge.net - General discussion and use of Avogadro.

    Archives

    • avogadro-devel @ lists.sourceforge.net - Discussion of development of Avogadro and Libavogadro. Start here if you want to get involved.

    Archives

    • avogadro-translations @ lists.sourceforge.net - Discussion about translating Avogadro.

    Archives

    IRC

    You can find most of Avogadro developers in the #avogadro channel on freenode (irc.freenode.net)
